dataset.title: GIS05 GIS Coverages Defining Konza Prairie Burn History (1977-present)

address.deliveryPoint: 116 Ackert Hall, Division of Biology, Kansas State University

para.literalLayout: This dataset contains a comprehensive record of burn histories for the Konza Prairie Biological Station (KPBS) dating from 1972. Burn history data contains date burned, area burned and type of treatment (prescribed burns, complete and partial burns, and wildfires). These data are available as zipped (.zip) shapefiles (.shp).

geographicCoverage.geographicDescription: Riley CountyGeary countyKansasKonza Prairie Biological StationKNZLTER

description.para: For additional methods information see: http://www.konza.ksu.edu/KNZ/docs/MM.pdf

spatialVector.entityDescription: This is a record of the watersheds that were burned in 1972 on the Konza Prairie Biological Station.

externallyDefinedFormat.formatName: zip file with ARC/INFO shape file

geographicCoverage.geographicDescription: Riley CountyGeary countyKansasKonza Prairie Biological StationKNZLTER

textDomain.definition: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.
Coordinates defining the features.

attribute.attributeDefinition: Total hectares burned per watershed in a given year

textDomain.definition: No further information about this attribute was provided

attribute.attributeDefinition: Type of burn #1. Types include: Prescribed Planned (PP), Prescribed Unplanned (PU), Wildfire Planned (WP), WU (Wildfire Unplanned).

parameter.name: Scale factor at central meridian
parameter.description: a multiplier for reducing a distance obtained from a map by computation or scaling to the actual distance along the central meridian.

parameter.name: Longitude at central meridian
parameter.description: The line of logitude at the center of the map projection

parameter.name: Latitude of projection origin
parameter.description: The latitude chosen as center of the projection

parameter.name: False Easting
parameter.description: A value added in a rectangular coordinate system, usually used to avoid negative values

parameter.name: False Northing
parameter.description: A value added in a rectangular coordinate system, usually used to avoid negative values

parameter.name: Scale factor at central meridian
parameter.description: a multiplier for reducing a distance obtained from a map by computation or scaling to the actual distance along the central meridian.

parameter.name: Longitude at central meridian
parameter.description: The line of logitude at the center of the map projection

parameter.name: Latitude of projection origin
parameter.description: The latitude chosen as center of the projection

parameter.name: False Easting
parameter.description: A value added in a rectangular coordinate system, usually used to avoid negative values

parameter.description: A value added in a rectangular coordinate system, usually used to avoid negative values
